alert.note: Alert for Coffee; Dale; Houston (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 01 at 1:26PM CDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Dale, southeastern Coffee and northwestern Houston Counties through 200 PM CDT... At 126 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Enterprise, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Daleville, Enterprise, Fort Rucker, Ozark, Level Plains, Newton, Clayhatchee, Hunt Field, Waterford, Hooper Stage Field, Knox Field, Gerald, Central City, Ewell, Cairns Aaf, Camp Alaflo Bsa, Enterprise Municipal A/P, Dean Church Road, Bagwells Crossroads and Lowe Army Heliport. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 700 PM CDT for southeastern Alabama.
